---
name: Feature Request
about: Suggest a new feature or improvement
title: "[Feature] "
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''
---

## Problem

What problem does this feature solve? What's frustrating about the current experience?

## Proposed solution

Describe what you'd like to happen. Be specific about the UI, workflow, or API changes.

## Alternatives considered

Any other approaches you've thought about.

## Additional context

- **Screenshots or mockups** — Visual examples help a lot
- **Links to similar features** — Examples from other products (Attio, HubSpot, Salesforce, etc.)
- **Use case** — How would you use this feature? What's your workflow?
- **Priority** — How important is this to you? (nice-to-have / important / critical)

Check if this feature is already planned in [DIFFERENCES.md](https://github.com/giorgosn/openclaw-crm/blob/main/DIFFERENCES.md):
- Sprint A (UI Polish)
- Sprint B (Tasks Page Rebuild)
- Sprint C (Table & Kanban Enhancements)

- Sprint E (Advanced Features - Phase 2)
- Not yet planned
